TABLE.NAME: quest_coderunner_options
TABLE.COMMENT: Extension of the coderunner question table

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Every home should have one

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The question this option applies to

FIELD.NAME: coderunner_type
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the prototype question from which this question inherits. It should be a valid question name within the current question category or one of its ancestors.

FIELD.NAME: prototype_type
FIELD.COMMENT: 0 => not a prototype, 1 => built-in prototype, 2 => user_defined prototype

FIELD.NAME: all_or_nothing
FIELD.COMMENT: True if answer must pass all test cases to earn any marks

FIELD.NAME: show_source
FIELD.COMMENT: True to display full source code after template expansion, for debugging template.

FIELD.NAME: showtest
FIELD.COMMENT: True if the test column of the results table is to be displayed to students

FIELD.NAME: showstdin
FIELD.COMMENT: True if the stdin column of the results table is to be displayed to students

FIELD.NAME: showexpected
FIELD.COMMENT: True if the expected column of the results table is to be displayed to students

FIELD.NAME: showoutput
FIELD.COMMENT: True if the output column of the results table is to be displayed to students

FIELD.NAME: showmark
FIELD.COMMENT: True if the mark column of the results table is to be displayed to students

FIELD.NAME: combinator_template
FIELD.COMMENT: An optional template to be used to combine all tests into a single run

FIELD.NAME: test_splitter_re
FIELD.COMMENT: The regular expression argument to preg_split to split output from the combinator run into the basic tests again. Meaningful only if combinator template provided

FIELD.NAME: per_test_template
FIELD.COMMENT: A template to build a test run for each test case. Required.

FIELD.NAME: language
FIELD.COMMENT: The programming language, to be passed to the sandbox

FIELD.NAME: sandbox
FIELD.COMMENT: The PHP class name of a specific sandbox to use. If null, a default one for the language is used.

FIELD.NAME: grader
FIELD.COMMENT: The PHP class name of the grader to use to grade results from the sandbox. If null, the BasicGrader class is used.

FIELD.NAME: cputimelimitsecs
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum CPU time allowed for execution (secs)

FIELD.NAME: memlimitmb
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum memory allowed for this task execution (MB)

TABLE.NAME: quest_coderunner_testcases
TABLE.COMMENT: A test case is a test to perform on a student's code answer; should output the given output. A test case is regarded as an extension of an 'answer' in Moodle parlance.

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key referencing question to which this test case relates

FIELD.NAME: testcode
FIELD.COMMENT: The code for this test, to be combined with the student's code to construct a test program

FIELD.NAME: stdin
FIELD.COMMENT: The standard input to the program during the test. Empty for most questions

FIELD.NAME: expected
FIELD.COMMENT: The expected output after running the student's code and executing the shell input

FIELD.NAME: useasexample
FIELD.COMMENT: True if this testcase is to be displayed in the spec as an example of how the function works.

FIELD.NAME: display
FIELD.COMMENT: Controls display of this testcase to the students. One of SHOW, HIDE, HIDE_IF_FAIL, HIDE_IF_SUCCEED

FIELD.NAME: hiderestiffail
FIELD.COMMENT: If this test fails, hide all subsequent tests regardless of their display settings

FIELD.NAME: mark
FIELD.COMMENT: Mark for this testcase (only if not an all_or_nothing question)
